post.body: Ender's Game is actually the only one of his I've read. Perhaps I should fix that. Maybe after I finish World War Z.
And my ears are yours as well. Even though that sounds gross. But you get what I'm saying. ;)
Thanks for the competition. Appreciate it. :) (Sorry, am seriously freaked at the moment)
...and the English girls totally appreciate you closing your eyes while they try to talk to you...really ;) Just joshin' ya.
Glad you enjoyed Ender's Game. It's one of my favorites!
Come visit me! :)
Um, what are you volunteering me for exactly? :)
Fear is always an excellent motivator to health. Thank you. :)
Cowboy it up dude.
Let me just get through being a Maid of Honor first. :)
That's some bladder! Welcome back and Happy New Year!
LOVE LOVE LOVE Band of Brothers. You lucky dog you.
Fuck sleep.
Will work for food. Is totally serious. Jenni is poorface.
Totally sweet The Guild tribute vid: http://tinyurl.com/6uckvd
Daniel did a really cool interview and talked about LJ15: http://tinyurl.com/7km9f7
My body is finally giving out on me. All work and all play make Jenni a sick girl.
Phone has returned to me. Life is complete once more.
OpRetrieve will soon be complete.
MY SISTER IS ENGAGED! I'M GETTING A BROTHER! YAYAYAYAYAYAYAY!
